descriptor.name: Aquaguard Marvel NXT RO+UV+TA+AC Water Purifier
descriptor.code: Aquaguard Marvel NXT RO+UV+TA+AC Water Purifier
descriptor.short_desc: Aquaguard Marvel NXT RO+UV+TA+AC Water Purifier | Upto 60% Water Savings | Active Copper Tech | Taste Adjuster | Suitable for Borewell, Tanker & Municipal Water | Free Installation | 2 Free Services
descriptor.long_desc: Product technology- RO+UV+Taste Adjuster (MTDS),RO is certified to remove new age contaminants like lead, mercury & arsenic from the water while eliminating all viruses & bacterias.UV e-boiling ensures that every drop of water is as healthy & safe as water boiled for 20 minutes.Taste Adjuster (MTDS) provides sweet tasting water by adjustment of taste depending upon the source of water. Patented technologies- 1) Patented Active Copper+Zinc Booster Technology*#: The active copper zinc booster cartridge infuses copper & zinc ions along with other essential minerals into the water. Copper & zinc are known to boost the immune system and enhance the taste of water.2) Patented Mineral Guard Technology: Helps to retain all essential natural minerals such as Calcium & Magnesium which provides perfect blend of safe and healthy water The product is suitable for all water sources (tanker, borewell, municipal water). This purifier can be used for TDS up to 2000 PPM (use a TDS meter to find out the correct TDS of your water source before buying a water purifier) Convenient Features: a) High storage capacity b) Purified stored water can be dispensed even without electricity c) LED indicator alerts for power on,tank full & service due d) Flexible Installation- The purifier can be easily wall mounted or kept on the counter top Saves up to 60% water- ordinary water purifiers end up wasting 50-75% water. Aquaguard water purifiers with superior technology purify water and regulate its taste to save up to 60%* water 6.2 Liters storage tank with 7 stages of purification Warranty Description: 1 year comprehensive domestic warranty on all parts excluding consumables. Included components: Plumbing Kit, Accessories, Product, Power Supply Adapter & Bracket For Adapter

list.value: Plumbing kit, accassories, product, power supply adapter & bracket for adapter

return_location.address: Channelier Electronics Pvt Ltd,  DWARKA SECTOR 28, Bamnoli Village,  South West Delhi, Delhi, India, 110077

descriptor.name: Aquaguard Sure Delight NXT RO+UV Water Purifier
descriptor.code: Aquaguard Sure Delight NXT RO+UV Water Purifier
descriptor.short_desc: Aquaguard Sure Delight NXT RO+UV Water Purifier | 4 Stage Purification | 6L Storage | Suitable for Borewell, Tanker & Municipal Water | From Eureka Forbes
descriptor.long_desc: Product Technology- RO+UV with 4 stages of purification RO Purification- RO membrane removes contaminants like lead and mercury and eliminates disease-causing viruses and bacteria UV Purification- UV e-boiling delivers water that is as safe and pure as water boiled for over 20 minutes Water Suitability- This product is suitable for water from all sources (tanker/ borewell/ municipal water). This purifier can be used for TDS up to 2000 PPM (use a TDS meter to find out the correct TDS of your water source before buying a water purifier) High Storage Capacity- 6L capacity storage tank Convenient Features- a) Smart LED Indication- Alerts you with service reminders, tank full indications, etc., b) Energy Saving Mode- Purified stored water can be dispensed without electricity. c) Flexible Installation- Wall-mounted/ Countertop 1 Year Warranty- Comprehensive domestic warranty on all parts excluding consumables

list.value: Water Purifier, User Manual, Plumbing Kit

descriptor.name: Livpure GLO PRO++ RO+UV+UF, Water Purifier
descriptor.code: Livpure GLO PRO++ RO+UV+UF, Water Purifier
descriptor.short_desc: Livpure GLO PRO++ RO+UV+UF, Water Purifier for Home - 7 L Storage, Suitable for Borewell, Tanker, Municipal Water (Black)
descriptor.long_desc: 7 Stage Purification: Livpure GLO PRO++ provides 7 stage advanced purification: 1) Sediment Flter 2) Pre-activated Carbon Absorber 3) Anti-Scalant Cartridge 4) RO Membrane 5) UV Disinfection 6) Ultra Filteration 7) Silver Impregnated Post Carbon Filter UV Disinfection : Ultraviolet radiation disinfects the water from water borne disease causing bacteria, virus and protozoa, making it safe to drink without the need of handling potential dangerous chemicals. UV does not change the taste or odour of the water and consumes less power. Ultra Filteration: Ultra Filtration disinfects the water by removing bacteria and viruses without removing beneficial minerals, ensuring pure and safe water. Post Carbon filter: Using post carbon filter gets rid of unpleasant smell from water and enhance water flavour. The silver in the filter stops the regrowth of bacteria to provide drinking water that is safe for consumption. Warranty & installation: This water purifier comes with a warranty of 1 year provided by the manufacturer from date of purchase This Purifier comes with 7 litres and Insect proof-high quality storage tank which helps in keeping the purified water pure for longer duration avoiding any sort of contamination post filtration The water purifier comes with sleek design that fits & suits your kitchen and interactive LED Indications -Power On, Purification Process and Tank Full Indication

list.value: Product, Installation Kit, User Manual Cum Warranty Card

descriptor.name: Urban Company Native M2 Water Purifier
descriptor.code: Urban Company Native M2 Water Purifier
descriptor.short_desc: Urban Company Native M2 Water Purifier | Needs no service for 2 Yrs | 10-stage filtration | RO+UV+UF+Copper+Minerals with Taste Adjuster | Smart IoT features | 8L capacity | 2 year warranty
descriptor.long_desc: Introducing 2 year filter life: Save up to â‚¹18,000 on total ownership and service costs with smart rinse technology that requires service only once in 2 years Smart Features (IoT): Smart monitoring via the Urban Company App for tracking water quality, filter & membrane health, and water consumption. Also, get an alert when the service is due Preset dispensing: Auto dispensing modes with glass & bottle filling, and free-flow. Also features guide light, retractable tray, and taste adjuster. Requires an active power supply to dispense water 10-stage water purification: RO+UV+UF+MTDS filtration boosted with copper, alkaline and essential minerals. US FDA certified 99.99% pure water. Ideal for all water sources - tanker, borewell and municipal water 2 year unconditional warranty: All filters, membranes & electrical parts changes covered at zero service cost. Avail warranty in one-click from the Urban Company app In-tank UV: Elevates your water safety with integrated UV light inside the storage tank which relentlessly eliminates germs, ensuring 24x7 protection against microbial infections 8 litre storage: 8L food grade tank which keeps the water free from harmful chemicals and fit for consumption
